title: locked or reported stolen
extract: Lost and Stolen Mobiles. If you report a mobile lost or stolen to your mobile service provider (eg Telstra, Optus, Vodafone) it can be blocked across all networks in Australia. This means that your phone cannot be used to make or receive calls or send or receive text messages on any network in Australia.
extract_html: Lost and Stolen Mobiles. If you report a mobile lost or stolen to your mobile service provider (eg Telstra, Optus, Vodafone) it can be blocked across all networks in Australia. This means that your phone cannot be used to make or receive calls or send or receive text messages on any network in Australia.
